messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hello.
Hello. Can you tell me what happened?
I need help. My dad is hurt.
Does he need an ambulance or police?
Police.
Hi, can I talk to your dad?
Okay.
Does he need an ambulance or police?
Ask him if he needs police.
He's right here, you have to come right away.
Ask him if he needs police or ambulance.
It’s okay. No, can I talk to him?
Just come now. I'm talking.
It's okay. Does he need an ambulance?
You have to come right now.
Okay, stay on the phone with me, okay?
Sir, do you need an ambulance?
They're everywhere. You really have to come.
Okay, the police are on their way.
Can you unlock the door for them?
Okay.
Stay on the phone. Put the phone down and go open the door, okay?
Okay.
Come in!
Sir, can you tell me what happened?
I was trying to work on something and it started bleeding.
Apply pressure on the wound, okay? Do you have any cloths?
Yes, I have a red one here.
Good, use that to apply pressure and stay calm. Help is on the way.
